DocAttribute.Name: PlacementRelTo
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used as the basis for positioning parameters.

DocAttribute.Name: Distance
DocAttribute.Documentation: The position relative to the referenced curve.

DocAttribute.Name: Orientation
DocAttribute.Documentation: Rotation of the object in the horizontal plane and vertical axis (after applying DistanceAlong, OffsetLateral, OffsetVertical, and OffsetLongitudinal).

DocAttribute.Name: CartesianPosition
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indicates the calculated global location and orientation in Cartesian coordinates as a fallback which may be used by applications that do not support linear placement.
